tool_description: An API which takes all the most important latest news about climate changing
name: Current Climate Changing News
title: Current Climate Changing News

api_list.name: GET individual News from one source in one place
api_list.description: Get all the information from a souce talking and treating this topic in their website or blog in this page, instead of you searching it by manually.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://current-climate-changing-news.p.rapidapi.com/ClimateNews/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "current-climate-changing-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://current-climate-changing-news.p.rapidapi.com/ClimateNews/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "current-climate-changing-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET all the climate changes news from different important sources in one place
api_list.description: This API lets you use and manage information about climate changes gathering all the information from a different important verified sources, in one place.
